page.title: 04CLUTTON HOUSES
page.content: {HAWTHORN COTTAGE } It was once three cottages, one had two small bedrooms, a back kitchen,a W.C. and two small gardens.It was let to Clutton R.D.C. at Â£6 10s 0d per annum. The other two were the same but had a front room and washhouse as well.They were let to Mr.J.W.Flower at Â£13 4s. 4d per annum. One had a spiral staircase, a small bread oven and a alcove. The bathroom and shed were not built then but were built in Victorian times. {17,VALLEY VIEW } I live at 17, Valley View. My house is quite new. It was built in the 1960's. Before it was built the ground was allotments. My house has 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom upstairs and downstairs a living room and a kitchen which have been extended.
